dialogue.introduction: Aircraft carrier, Houshou. Although I'm inexperienced, I look forward to your guidance.
dialogue.library_intro: I am aircraft carrier Houshou. Built as CV from the beginning, I'm the world's first aircraft carrier. I am a petite ship, but I'll do my best.
dialogue.secretary2: You must be so tired. Should I prepare the bath? Or dinner? Or... hehe, just kidding.
dialogue.secretary3: My dream? Well... I'd like to open a little restaurant someday with you... Oh, what am I saying! Sorry, please forget it.
dialogue.secretaryidle: Admiral, I'll stay here, so please tell me to support you whenever you need my help.
dialogue.secretarymarried: Admiral, thank you for your long service. Occasionally, take a relaxing break please.
dialogue.wedding: Someday... Someday, with just the two of us, I would like to take a laid-back sea cruise together.
dialogue.show_players_score: There's a message for you, Admiral.
dialogue.joining_a_fleet: Actual combat...? I guess that's inevitable.
dialogue.equipment1: I'm sorry, for you to be strengthening my armaments is...
dialogue.equipment2: Isn't this too... fancy for me?
dialogue.docking_minor_damage: Yes, I'll take a little rest.
dialogue.docking_moderate_damage: I shouldn't be the one acting recklessly.
dialogue.docking_complete: A girl with fixed outfit has returned.
dialogue.ship_construction: It looks like a new girl is here!
dialogue.return_from_sortie: It was a busy day. The fleet is back.
dialogue.battle_start: Wind direction... Check! Air unit, take off!
dialogue.air_battle: We can't be doing exercises forever!
dialogue.attack: This is an actual combat, not an exercise!
dialogue.night_battle: I shall do it when I must!
dialogue.mvp: What... Really? It's my pleasure to have been of some help to you!
dialogue.moderately_damaged: I'm not going to sink like this!
dialogue.sunk: Even I... sink as well, huh...
